#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000009
#define MAXN 100005
#define pi 3.14159
#define D 1009
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 

int64 arr[10];

int main(){
	int n,i,j;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>arr[i];
	int64 val=101;
	for(i=1;i<(1<<n);i++){
		int64 temp=1;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++){
			if(i&(1<<j))
			temp*=arr[j];
		}
		val=min(val,temp);
	}
	cout<<val<<endl;
	return 0;
}
